trans-unit.source: Specifies information about how a document is printed, including the printer that prints it, when printing from a Windows Forms application.
trans-unit.target: Specifica informazioni sulle modalità con cui viene stampato un documento, inclusa la stampante che lo stampa, in caso di stampa da un'applicazione Windows Forms.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you access a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> through <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PrinterSettings%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties to modify printer settings.
trans-unit.target: In genere, per accedere un <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> tramite <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PrinterSettings%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> per modificare le impostazioni della stampante.

trans-unit.source: The most common printer setting is <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A>, which specifies the printer to print to.
trans-unit.target: L'impostazione della stampante più comune è <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A>, che specifica la stampante per stampare.

trans-unit.source: For more information about printing with Windows Forms, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace overview.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla stampa con Windows Form, vedere il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> panoramica dello spazio dei nomi.

trans-unit.source: If you wish to print from a Windows Presentation Foundation application, see the <xref:System.Printing> namespace.
trans-unit.target: Se si desidera stampare da un'applicazione Windows Presentation Foundation, vedere il <xref:System.Printing> dello spazio dei nomi.

trans-unit.source: The following code example prints a document on the specified printer.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente stampa un documento sulla stampante specificata.

trans-unit.source: The example has three prerequisites:
trans-unit.target: L'esempio include tre prerequisiti:

trans-unit.source: A variable named `filePath` has been set to the path of the file to print.
trans-unit.target: Una variabile denominata `filePath` è stato impostato per il percorso del file da stampare.

trans-unit.source: A method named `pd_PrintPage`, which handles the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event, has been defined.
trans-unit.target: Un metodo denominato `pd_PrintPage`, che gestisce il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> evento, è stato definito.

trans-unit.source: A variable named `printer` has been set to the printer's name.
trans-unit.target: Una variabile denominata `printer` è stata impostata per il nome della stampante.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>, and <xref:System.IO> namespaces for this example.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Drawing>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>, e <xref:System.IO> gli spazi dei nomi per questo esempio.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings" />.

trans-unit.source: The default constructor initializes all fields to their default values.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore predefinito inizializza tutti i campi in base ai valori predefiniti.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you do not create an instance of <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>, but instead use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to set settings for the printer.
trans-unit.target: In genere, non si crea un'istanza di <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>, ma usare invece il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrinterSettings%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> per impostare le impostazioni della stampante.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the printer supports double-sided printing.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se la stampante supporta la stampa fronte retro.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the printer supports double-sided printing; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se la stampante supporta la stampa fronte retro; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: To print using duplex, and if the printer supports it, set <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Duplex%2A> to one of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Duplex> values.
trans-unit.target: Per stampare utilizzando duplex e, se la stampante supporta questa modalità, impostare <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Duplex%2A> a uno del <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Duplex> valori.

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings" />.
trans-unit.target: Crea una copia dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings" />.

trans-unit.source: A copy of this object.
trans-unit.target: Copia dell'oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the printed document is collated.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se il documento stampato è fascicolato.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the printed document is collated; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se il documento stampato è fascicolato; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Collating is performed only when the number of copies is greater than 1.
trans-unit.target: Ordinamento viene eseguita solo quando il numero di copie è maggiore di 1.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Copies%2A> property to specify the number of copies to print.
trans-unit.target: Impostare il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Copies%2A> proprietà per specificare il numero di copie da stampare.

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Collate%2A> to `true` will print a complete copy of the document before the first page of the next copy is printed.
trans-unit.target: Impostazione <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Collate%2A> a `true` verrà stampata una copia completa del documento prima della stampa la prima pagina della copia successiva.

trans-unit.source: `false` will print each page by the number of copies specified before printing the next page.
trans-unit.target: `false` verrà stampata ogni pagina per il numero di copie specificato prima di stampare la pagina successiva.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of copies of the document to print.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il numero di copie del documento da stampare.

trans-unit.source: The number of copies to print.
trans-unit.target: Il numero di copie da stampare.

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è 1.

trans-unit.source: Not all printers support printing multiple copes.
trans-unit.target: Non tutte le stampanti supportano la stampa di più copie.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MaximumCopies%2A> property to determine the maximum number of copies the printer supports.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MaximumCopies%2A> proprietà per determinare il numero massimo di copia supporta la stampante.

trans-unit.source: If the number of copies is set higher than the maximum copies supported by the printer, only the maximum number of copies will be printed, and no exception will occur.
trans-unit.target: Se il numero di copie è maggiore del massime copie supportate dalla stampante, verrà stampato solo il numero massimo di copie e viene generata alcuna eccezione.

trans-unit.source: Some printers might not support printing more than one copy at a time.
trans-unit.target: Alcune stampanti potrebbero non supportare la stampa di più di una copia alla volta.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Copies" /> property is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: Il valore della proprietà <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Copies" /> è minore di 0.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> that contains printer information.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> che contiene le informazioni della stampante.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> that contains printer information that is useful when creating a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> che contiene le informazioni della stampante utili per la creazione di una classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> that contains information from a printer.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> che contiene le informazioni di una stampante.

trans-unit.source: With the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.CreateMeasurementGraphics%2A> method, you can obtain a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> for the printer without creating a print job.
trans-unit.target: Con il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.CreateMeasurementGraphics%2A> (metodo), è possibile ottenere un <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> per la stampante senza creare un processo di stampa.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to make decisions on how to layout visual elements like fonts, sizes, and type styles of a complex print job.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> per sul layout degli elementi visivi come tipi di carattere, dimensioni e stili di tipo di un processo di stampa complesso.

trans-unit.source: The printer named in the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName" /> property does not exist.
trans-unit.target: La stampante indicata nella proprietà <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName" /> non esiste.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate the origin at the margins; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> per indicare l'origine in corrispondenza dei margini; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> that contains printer information, optionally specifying the origin at the margins.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> che contiene le informazioni della stampante, in cui viene eventualmente specificata l'origine in corrispondenza dei margini.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> that contains printer information from the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> che contiene le informazioni della stampante derivanti dalla classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings" />.

trans-unit.source: With the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.CreateMeasurementGraphics%2A> method, you can obtain a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> for the printer without creating a print job.
trans-unit.target: Con il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.CreateMeasurementGraphics%2A> (metodo), è possibile ottenere un <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> per la stampante senza creare un processo di stampa.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to make decisions on how to layout visual elements like fonts, sizes, and type styles of a complex print job.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> per sul layout degli elementi visivi come tipi di carattere, dimensioni e stili di tipo di un processo di stampa complesso.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings" /> to retrieve a graphics object for.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings" /> per il quale recuperare un oggetto Graphics.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> that contains printer information associated with the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings" />.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> contenente le informazioni della stampante associate alla classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings" /> specificata.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> that contains printer information from the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> che contiene le informazioni della stampante derivanti dalla classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings" />.

trans-unit.source: With the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.CreateMeasurementGraphics%2A> method, you can obtain a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> for the printer without creating a print job.
trans-unit.target: Con il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.CreateMeasurementGraphics%2A> (metodo), è possibile ottenere un <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> per la stampante senza creare un processo di stampa.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to make decisions on how to layout visual elements like fonts, sizes, and type styles of a complex print job.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> per sul layout degli elementi visivi come tipi di carattere, dimensioni e stili di tipo di un processo di stampa complesso.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings" /> to retrieve a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> object for.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings" /> per il quale recuperare un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to specify the origin at the margins; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> per specificare l'origine in corrispondenza dei margini; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> associated with the specified page settings and optionally specifying the origin at the margins.
trans-unit.target: Crea un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> associato alle impostazioni della pagina specificate, in cui viene eventualmente specificata l'origine in corrispondenza dei margini.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> that contains printer information from the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> che contiene le informazioni della stampante derivanti dalla classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.CreateMeasurementGraphics%2A> method allows you to obtain a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> for the printer without creating a print job.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.CreateMeasurementGraphics%2A> metodo consente di ottenere un <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> per la stampante senza creare un processo di stampa.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to make decisions on how to layout visual elements like fonts, sizes, and type styles of a complex print job.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> per sul layout degli elementi visivi come tipi di carattere, dimensioni e stili di tipo di un processo di stampa complesso.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default page settings for this printer.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene le impostazioni di pagina predefinite per questa stampante.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings" /> that represents the default page settings for this printer.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings" /> che rappresenta le impostazioni di pagina predefinite per questa stampante.

trans-unit.source: Page settings include the size of the margins on the page, the size of paper to use, and whether to print in color.
trans-unit.target: Le impostazioni della pagina includono le dimensioni dei margini della pagina, le dimensioni della carta da utilizzare e se vengono stampati a colori.

trans-unit.source: For more information about page settings, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings> class.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulle impostazioni della pagina, vedere la <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the printer setting for double-sided printing.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta le impostazioni della stampante per la stampa fronte retro.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.Duplex" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei valori di <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.Duplex" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is determined by the printer.
trans-unit.target: L'impostazione predefinita è determinata dalla stampante.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.CanDuplex%2A> property to check to see if the printer supports duplex printing.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.CanDuplex%2A> proprietà da controllare per verificare se la stampante supporta la stampa fronte retro.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Duplex" /> property is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.Duplex" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Il valore della proprietà <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Duplex" /> non è uno dei valori di <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.Duplex" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the page number of the first page to print.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il numero di pagina della prima pagina da stampare.

trans-unit.source: The page number of the first page to print.
trans-unit.target: Numero di pagina della prima pagina da stampare.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> properties are used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> when the user selects a print range.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> vengono utilizzate da di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> quando l'utente seleziona un intervallo di stampa.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSomePages%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property must be set to `true` to enable the user to specify a print range.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSomePages%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> proprietà deve essere impostata su `true` per consentire all'utente di specificare un intervallo di stampa.

trans-unit.source: In addition, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> requires the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MinimumPage%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MaximumPage%2A> to be specified and the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A> value to be within that range.
trans-unit.target: Inoltre, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> richiede il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MinimumPage%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MaximumPage%2A> specificare e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A> valore sia all'interno dell'intervallo.

trans-unit.source: During the printing process, in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=nameWithType> event, view the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> to determine what should be printed.
trans-unit.target: Durante il processo di stampa nel <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento, visualizzazione di <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> per determinare cosa deve essere stampata.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> is <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange.SomePages?displayProperty=nameWithType>, use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> properties to determine what pages should be printed.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> è <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange.SomePages?displayProperty=nameWithType>, utilizzare il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> proprietà per individuare le pagine da stampare.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> is <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange.Selection?displayProperty=nameWithType>, then specify output only for the selected pages.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> è <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange.Selection?displayProperty=nameWithType>, quindi specificare l'output solo per le pagine selezionate.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> can also be set programmatically, though the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=nameWithType> implementation is the same.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> possono essere impostate anche a livello di codice, tuttavia il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=nameWithType> implementazione è lo stesso.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage" /> property's value is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: Il valore della proprietà <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage" /> è minore di 0.

trans-unit.source: Creates a handle to a <see langword="DEVMODE" /> structure that corresponds to the printer settings.
trans-unit.target: Crea un handle per una struttura <see langword="DEVMODE" /> che corrisponde alle impostazioni della stampante.

trans-unit.source: Creates a handle to a <see langword="DEVMODE" /> structure that corresponds to the printer settings.
trans-unit.target: Crea un handle per una struttura <see langword="DEVMODE" /> che corrisponde alle impostazioni della stampante.

trans-unit.source: A handle to a <see langword="DEVMODE" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Handle per una struttura <see langword="DEVMODE" />.

trans-unit.source: `DEVMODE` structures are device specific.
trans-unit.target: `DEVMODE` le strutture sono specifiche del dispositivo.

trans-unit.source: Copying a `DEVMODE` structure from one <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> to a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> for a different printer is not supported.
trans-unit.target: Copia un `DEVMODE` struttura da una <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> per un <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> per una stampante diversa non è supportata.

trans-unit.source: When you are done with the handle that is created through this method, you must deallocate it yourself by calling the native Win32 `GlobalFree` method.
trans-unit.target: Una volta con l'handle è stato creato tramite questo metodo, è necessario deallocarlo manualmente chiamando Win32 nativo `GlobalFree` metodo.

trans-unit.source: When you call this method, you pass as a parameter the return value from the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.GetHdevmode%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Quando si chiama questo metodo, si passa come parametro il valore restituito dal <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.GetHdevmode%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: The printer named in the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName" /> property does not exist.
trans-unit.target: La stampante indicata nella proprietà <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName" /> non esiste.

trans-unit.source: The printer's initialization information could not be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: Impossibile recuperare le informazioni di inizializzazione della stampante.

trans-unit.source: for printing and access to all printers on the network.
trans-unit.target: Per stampare e accedere a tutte le stampanti in rete.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.AllPrinting" />
trans-unit.target: Enumerazione associata: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.AllPrinting" />

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings" /> object that the <see langword="DEVMODE" /> structure's handle corresponds to.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings" /> a cui corrisponde l'handle per la struttura <see langword="DEVMODE" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a handle to a <see langword="DEVMODE" /> structure that corresponds to the printer and the page settings specified through the <paramref name="pageSettings" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: Crea un handle per una struttura <see langword="DEVMODE" /> che corrisponde alle impostazioni della stampante e della pagina specificate tramite il parametro <paramref name="pageSettings" />.

trans-unit.source: A handle to a <see langword="DEVMODE" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Handle per una struttura <see langword="DEVMODE" />.

trans-unit.source: `DEVMODE` structures are device specific.
trans-unit.target: `DEVMODE` le strutture sono specifiche del dispositivo.

trans-unit.source: Copying a `DEVMODE` structure from one <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> to a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> for a different printer is not supported.
trans-unit.target: Copia un `DEVMODE` struttura da una <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> per un <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> per una stampante diversa non è supportata.

trans-unit.source: When you are done with the handle that is created through this method, you must deallocate it yourself by calling the native Win32 `GlobalFree` method.
trans-unit.target: Una volta con l'handle è stato creato tramite questo metodo, è necessario deallocarlo manualmente chiamando Win32 nativo `GlobalFree` metodo.

trans-unit.source: When you call this method, you pass as a parameter the return value from the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.GetHdevmode%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Quando si chiama questo metodo, si passa come parametro il valore restituito dal <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.GetHdevmode%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: The printer named in the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName" /> property does not exist.
trans-unit.target: La stampante indicata nella proprietà <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName" /> non esiste.

trans-unit.source: The printer's initialization information could not be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: Impossibile recuperare le informazioni di inizializzazione della stampante.

trans-unit.source: for printing and access to all printers on the network.
trans-unit.target: Per stampare e accedere a tutte le stampanti in rete.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.AllPrinting" />
trans-unit.target: Enumerazione associata: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.AllPrinting" />

trans-unit.source: Creates a handle to a <see langword="DEVNAMES" /> structure that corresponds to the printer settings.
trans-unit.target: Crea un handle per una struttura <see langword="DEVNAMES" /> che corrisponde alle impostazioni della stampante.

trans-unit.source: A handle to a <see langword="DEVNAMES" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Handle per una struttura <see langword="DEVNAMES" />.

trans-unit.source: When you are done with the handle that is created through this method, you must deallocate it yourself by calling the native Win32 `GlobalFree` method.
trans-unit.target: Una volta con l'handle è stato creato tramite questo metodo, è necessario deallocarlo manualmente chiamando Win32 nativo `GlobalFree` metodo.

trans-unit.source: When you call this method, you pass as a parameter the return value from the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.GetHdevnames%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Quando si chiama questo metodo, si passa come parametro il valore restituito dal <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.GetHdevnames%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: for printing and access to all printers on the network.
trans-unit.target: Per stampare e accedere a tutte le stampanti in rete.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.AllPrinting" />
trans-unit.target: Enumerazione associata: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.AllPrinting" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the names of all printers installed on the computer.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene i nomi di tutte le stampanti installate nel computer.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.StringCollection" /> that represents the names of all printers installed on the computer.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.StringCollection" /> che rappresenta i nomi di tutte le stampanti installate nel computer.

trans-unit.source: You can use the collection of installed printer names to provide the user a choice of printers to print to.
trans-unit.target: Per fornire all'utente di scegliere di stampare su stampanti, è possibile utilizzare la raccolta di nomi di stampante installata.

trans-unit.source: The following code example populates the `comboInstalledPrinters` combo box with the installed printers and also sets the printer to print, using the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A> property, when the selection changes.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente consente di popolare il `comboInstalledPrinters` casella combinata con le stampanti installate e imposta inoltre la stampante per stampare, utilizzando il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A> proprietà, quando cambia la selezione.

trans-unit.source: The `PopulateInstalledPrintersCombo` routine is called when the form is being initialized.
trans-unit.target: Il `PopulateInstalledPrintersCombo` routine viene chiamata quando il form viene inizializzato.

trans-unit.source: The example requires that a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> variable named `printDoc` exists and that the specific combo box exists.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio si presuppone che un <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> variabile denominata `printDoc` esista e che esista la casella combinata specifica.

trans-unit.source: The available printers could not be enumerated.
trans-unit.target: Impossibile enumerare le stampanti disponibili.

trans-unit.source: for printing and access to all printers on the network.
trans-unit.target: Per stampare e accedere a tutte le stampanti in rete.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.AllPrinting" />
trans-unit.target: Enumerazione associata: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.AllPrinting" />

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName" /> property designates the default printer, except when the user explicitly sets <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName" /> definisce la stampante predefinita, tranne quando l'utente imposta esplicitamente la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName" /> designates the default printer; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName" /> definisce la stampante predefinita; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.IsDefaultPrinter%2A> always returns `false` when you explicitly set the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A> property to a string value other than `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.IsDefaultPrinter%2A> Restituisce sempre `false` quando si imposta in modo esplicito il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A> su un valore di stringa diversa da `null`.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.IsDefaultPrinter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.IsDefaultPrinter%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the following code into a form and call `PopulateInstalledPrintersCombo` from the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event-handling method.
trans-unit.target: Per eseguire questo esempio, incollare il codice seguente in un form e chiamare `PopulateInstalledPrintersCombo` dal costruttore del form o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> il metodo di gestione degli eventi.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the printer supports printing an image file.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un valore che indica se la stampante supporta la stampa di un file di immagine.

trans-unit.source: The image to print.
trans-unit.target: Immagine da stampare.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the printer supports printing the specified image file.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se la stampante supporta la stampa del file di immagine specificato.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the printer supports printing the specified image; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se la stampante supporta la stampa dell'immagine specificata; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> to print.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> da stampare.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the printer supports printing the specified image format.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un valore che indica se la stampante supporta la stampa del formato immagine specificato.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the printer supports printing the specified image format; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se la stampante supporta la stampa del formato immagine specificato; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the printer is a plotter.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se la stampante è un plotter.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the printer is a plotter; <see langword="false" /> if the printer is a raster.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se la stampante è un plotter, <see langword="false" /> se la stampante è un raster.

trans-unit.source: A plotter is a printer that is vector-based as opposed to raster-based.
trans-unit.target: Un plotter è una stampante basata su vettore anziché basato su raster.

trans-unit.source: Most vector-based printers use individual plotting pens to produce output.
trans-unit.target: La maggior parte delle stampanti basato su vettore utilizzano singoli penne tracciate per produrre l'output.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName" /> property designates a valid printer.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName" /> definisce una stampante valida.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName" /> property designates a valid printer; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName" /> definisce una stampante valida; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: When you get or set some properties, a valid printer is required or else an exception is raised.
trans-unit.target: Quando si ottenere o impostare alcune proprietà, è necessaria una stampante valida o in caso contrario, viene generata un'eccezione.

trans-unit.source: To avoid exceptions, use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.IsValid%2A> property after setting the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A> to safely determine if the printer is valid.
trans-unit.target: Per evitare eccezioni, utilizzare il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.IsValid%2A> proprietà dopo l'impostazione di <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A> per stabilire se la stampante non è valida.

trans-unit.source: The following code example specifies the target printer by setting the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A> property, and if the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.IsValid%2A> is `true`, prints the document on the specified printer.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente specifica la stampante di destinazione impostando il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A> , proprietà e, se il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.IsValid%2A> è `true`, stampa il documento sulla stampante specificata.

trans-unit.source: The example has three prerequisites:
trans-unit.target: L'esempio include tre prerequisiti:

trans-unit.source: A variable named `filePath` has been set to the path of the file to print.
trans-unit.target: Una variabile denominata `filePath` è stato impostato per il percorso del file da stampare.

trans-unit.source: A method named `pd_PrintPage`, which handles the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event, has been defined.
trans-unit.target: Un metodo denominato `pd_PrintPage`, che gestisce il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> evento, è stato definito.

trans-unit.source: A variable named `printer` has been set to the printer's name.
trans-unit.target: Una variabile denominata `printer` è stata impostata per il nome della stampante.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>, and <xref:System.IO> namespaces for this example.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Drawing>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>, e <xref:System.IO> gli spazi dei nomi per questo esempio.

trans-unit.source: Gets the angle, in degrees, that the portrait orientation is rotated to produce the landscape orientation.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'angolo di rotazione, espresso in gradi, dell'orientamento verticale per generare l'orientamento orizzontale.

trans-unit.source: The angle, in degrees, that the portrait orientation is rotated to produce the landscape orientation.
trans-unit.target: Angolo di rotazione, espresso in gradi, dell'orientamento verticale per generare l'orientamento orizzontale.

trans-unit.source: Valid rotation values are 90 and 270 degrees.
trans-unit.target: I valori di rotazione validi sono 90 e 270 gradi.

trans-unit.source: If landscape is not supported, the only valid rotation value is 0 degrees.
trans-unit.target: Se orizzontale non è supportata, il valore di rotazione solo valido è 0 gradi.

trans-unit.source: You set the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Landscape%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to `true` to print a page in landscape format.
trans-unit.target: Impostare il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Landscape%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> proprietà `true` per stampare una pagina in formato orizzontale.

trans-unit.source: Gets the maximum number of copies that the printer enables the user to print at a time.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il numero massimo di copie alla volta di cui la stampante supporta la stampa.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of copies that the printer enables the user to print at a time.
trans-unit.target: Numero massimo di copie alla volta di cui la stampante supporta la stampa.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Copies%2A> property to the number of copies to print.
trans-unit.target: Impostare il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.Copies%2A> proprietà per il numero di copie da stampare.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MaximumCopies%2A> property to determine if your printer supports printing multiple copies at a time, because some printers do not.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MaximumCopies%2A> proprietà per determinare se la stampante supporta la stampa di più copie contemporaneamente, poiché alcune stampanti non.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage" /> or <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage" /> that can be selected in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il valore massimo di <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage" /> o <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage" /> che può essere selezionato in un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog" />.

trans-unit.source: The maximum <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage" /> or <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage" /> that can be selected in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog" />.
trans-unit.target: Valore massimo di <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage" /> o <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage" /> che può essere selezionato in un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> properties are used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> when the user selects a print range.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> vengono utilizzate da di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> quando l'utente seleziona un intervallo di stampa.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSomePages%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property must be set to `true` to enable the user to specify a print range.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSomePages%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> proprietà deve essere impostata su `true` per consentire all'utente di specificare un intervallo di stampa.

trans-unit.source: When setting the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A> or <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> values programmatically, ensure that they are within the range defined by the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MinimumPage%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MaximumPage%2A> properties, or an exception is thrown when displaying the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>.
trans-unit.target: Quando si imposta la <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A> o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> valori a livello di codice, verificare che siano compresi nell'intervallo definito dal <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MinimumPage%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MaximumPage%2A> , proprietà o un'eccezione viene generata quando viene visualizzato il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MaximumPage" /> property is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: Il valore della proprietà <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MaximumPage" /> è minore di 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage" /> or <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage" /> that can be selected in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il valore minimo di <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage" /> o <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage" /> che può essere selezionato in un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog" />.

trans-unit.source: The minimum <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage" /> or <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage" /> that can be selected in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog" />.
trans-unit.target: Valore minimo di <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage" /> o <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage" /> che può essere selezionato in un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> properties are used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> when the user selects a print range.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> vengono utilizzate da di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> quando l'utente seleziona un intervallo di stampa.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSomePages%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property must be set to `true` to enable the user to specify a print range.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSomePages%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> proprietà deve essere impostata su `true` per consentire all'utente di specificare un intervallo di stampa.

trans-unit.source: When setting the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A> or <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> values programmatically, ensure that they are within the range defined by the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MinimumPage%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MaximumPage%2A> properties, or an exception is thrown when displaying the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>.
trans-unit.target: Quando si imposta la <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A> o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> valori a livello di codice, verificare che siano compresi nell'intervallo definito dal <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MinimumPage%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MaximumPage%2A> , proprietà o un'eccezione viene generata quando viene visualizzato il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MinimumPage" /> property is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: Il valore della proprietà <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MinimumPage" /> è minore di 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets the paper sizes that are supported by this printer.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene i formati della carta supportati da questa stampante.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PaperSizeCollection" /> that represents the paper sizes that are supported by this printer.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PaperSizeCollection" /> che rappresenta i formati della carta supportati da questa stampante.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PaperSizeCollection> contains <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize> instances that represent the paper sizes through the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize.Kind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, which contains one of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperKind> values.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PaperSizeCollection> contiene <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize> istanze che rappresentano i formati della carta tramite il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize.Kind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> proprietà, che contiene uno dei valori la <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperKind> valori.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you set a page's paper size through the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PaperSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to a valid <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize> available through the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PaperSizes%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: In genere, carta il formato della impostato tramite la <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PaperSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> proprietà su un valore valido <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize> disponibili tramite il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PaperSizes%2A> insieme.

trans-unit.source: To specify a custom paper size, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Per specificare un formato personalizzato, vedere il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize.%23ctor%2A> costruttore.

trans-unit.source: The following code example populates the `comboPaperSize` combo box with the printer's supported paper sizes.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente consente di popolare il `comboPaperSize` formati carta supportati casella combinata con la stampante.

trans-unit.source: In addition, a custom paper size is created and added to the combo box.
trans-unit.target: Inoltre, un formato personalizzato viene creato e aggiunto alla casella combinata.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize.PaperName%2A> is identified as the property that provides the display string for the item being added through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A> property of the combo box.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize.PaperName%2A> viene identificato come proprietà che fornisce la stringa di visualizzazione per l'elemento aggiunto mediante il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A> proprietà della casella combinata.

trans-unit.source: The example requires that a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> variable named `printDoc` exists and that the specific combo box exists.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio si presuppone che un <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> variabile denominata `printDoc` esista e che esista la casella combinata specifica.

trans-unit.source: Gets the paper source trays that are available on the printer.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene i cassetti di alimentazione disponibili nella stampante.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PaperSourceCollection" /> that represents the paper source trays that are available on this printer.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PaperSourceCollection" /> che rappresenta i cassetti di alimentazione disponibili in questa stampante.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PaperSourceCollection> contains <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource> instances that represent the paper source trays through the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource.Kind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, which contains one of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind> values.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PaperSourceCollection> contiene <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource> istanze che rappresentano i cassetti tramite il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource.Kind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> proprietà, che contiene uno dei valori la <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind> valori.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you set a page's paper source through the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PaperSource%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to a valid <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource> available through the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PaperSources%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: In genere, è impostato il formato della carta tramite la <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PaperSource%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> proprietà su un valore valido <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource> disponibili tramite il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PaperSources%2A> insieme.

trans-unit.source: The following code example populates the `comboPaperSource` combo box with the printer's supported paper sources.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente consente di popolare il `comboPaperSource` casella combinata con la stampante tipi di alimentazione supportati.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource.SourceName%2A> is identified as the property that provides the display string for the item being added through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A> property of the combo box.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource.SourceName%2A> viene identificato come proprietà che fornisce la stringa di visualizzazione per l'elemento aggiunto mediante il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A> proprietà della casella combinata.

trans-unit.source: The example requires that a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> variable named `printDoc` exists and that the specific combo box exists.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio si presuppone che un <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> variabile denominata `printDoc` esista e che esista la casella combinata specifica.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the printer to use.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il nome della stampante da utilizzare.

trans-unit.source: The name of the printer to use.
trans-unit.target: Nome della stampante da utilizzare.

trans-unit.source: After setting the printer name, call <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.IsValid%2A> to determine if the printer name is recognized as a valid printer on the system.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver impostato il nome della stampante, chiamare <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.IsValid%2A> per determinare se il nome della stampante è riconosciuto come una stampante valida nel sistema.

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.InstalledPrinters%2A> property to get a list of printers installed on the system.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.InstalledPrinters%2A> proprietà da ottenere un elenco delle stampanti installate nel sistema.

trans-unit.source: The following code example specifies the target printer by setting the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A> property, and if the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.IsValid%2A> is `true`, prints the document on the specified printer.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente specifica la stampante di destinazione impostando il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A> , proprietà e, se il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.IsValid%2A> è `true`, stampa il documento sulla stampante specificata.

trans-unit.source: The example has three prerequisites:
trans-unit.target: L'esempio include tre prerequisiti:

trans-unit.source: A variable named `filePath` has been set to the path of the file to print.
trans-unit.target: Una variabile denominata `filePath` è stato impostato per il percorso del file da stampare.

trans-unit.source: A method named `pd_PrintPage`, which handles the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event, has been defined.
trans-unit.target: Un metodo denominato `pd_PrintPage`, che gestisce il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> evento, è stato definito.

trans-unit.source: A variable named `printer` has been set to the printer's name.
trans-unit.target: Una variabile denominata `printer` è stata impostata per il nome della stampante.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>, and <xref:System.IO> namespaces for this example.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Drawing>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>, e <xref:System.IO> gli spazi dei nomi per questo esempio.

trans-unit.source: for printing and access to all printers on the network.
trans-unit.target: Per stampare e accedere a tutte le stampanti in rete.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.AllPrinting" />
trans-unit.target: Enumerazione associata: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.AllPrinting" />

trans-unit.source: Gets all the resolutions that are supported by this printer.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene tutte le risoluzioni supportate da questa stampante.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterResolutionCollection" /> that represents the resolutions that are supported by this printer.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterResolutionCollection" /> che rappresenta le risoluzioni supportate da questa stampante.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterResolutionCollection> contains <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution> instances that represent the printer resolutions supported through the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Kind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, which contains one of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind> values.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterResolutionCollection> contiene <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution> istanze che rappresentano le risoluzioni stampante supportate tramite il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Kind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> proprietà, che contiene uno dei valori la <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind> valori.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you set a page's paper source through the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PrinterResolution%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to a valid <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution> available through the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterResolutions%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: In genere, è impostato il formato della carta tramite la <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PrinterResolution%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> proprietà su un valore valido <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution> disponibili tramite il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterResolutions%2A> insieme.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind> is `Custom`, then use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.X%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Y%2A> properties to determine the custom printer resolution in the horizontal and vertical directions, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind> è `Custom`, quindi utilizzare il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.X%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Y%2A> le proprietà per determinare la risoluzione di stampa personalizzata nelle direzioni orizzontale e verticale, rispettivamente.

trans-unit.source: The following code example populates the `comboPrintResolution` combo box with the supported resolutions.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente consente di popolare il `comboPrintResolution` casella combinata con le risoluzioni supportate.

trans-unit.source: The example requires that a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> variable named `printDoc` exists and that the specific combo box exists.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio si presuppone che un <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> variabile denominata `printDoc` esista e che esista la casella combinata specifica.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the file name, when printing to a file.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il nome file, durante la stampa su un file.

trans-unit.source: The file name, when printing to a file.
trans-unit.target: Nome file, durante la stampa su un file.

trans-unit.source: for read access when getting the file name and write access when setting the file name.
trans-unit.target: per l'accesso in lettura durante il recupero del nome e l'accesso in scrittura quando si imposta il nome del file.

trans-unit.source: Related enumeration <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess" />.
trans-unit.target: Enumerazione correlata <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the page numbers that the user has specified to be printed.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta i numeri di pagina specificati dall'utente per la stampa.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei valori di <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> property is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>.when the user selects a print range.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> proprietà viene utilizzata per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>quando l'utente seleziona un intervallo di stampa.

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> is `AllPages`.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito di <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> è `AllPages`.

trans-unit.source: To enable the user to specify a range of pages to print, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSomePages%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property must be set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Per consentire all'utente di specificare un intervallo di pagine da stampare, di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSomePages%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> proprietà deve essere impostata su `true`.

trans-unit.source: To enable the user to specify the selected pages to print, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSelection%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property must be set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Per consentire all'utente di specificare le pagine da stampare la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSelection%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> proprietà deve essere impostata su `true`.

trans-unit.source: During the printing process, in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=nameWithType> event, view the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> to determine what should be printed.
trans-unit.target: Durante il processo di stampa nel <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento, visualizzazione di <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> per determinare cosa deve essere stampata.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> is <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange.SomePages?displayProperty=nameWithType>, use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> properties to determine what pages should be printed.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> è <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange.SomePages?displayProperty=nameWithType>, utilizzare il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> proprietà per individuare le pagine da stampare.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> is <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange.Selection?displayProperty=nameWithType>, then specify output only for the selected pages.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> è <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange.Selection?displayProperty=nameWithType>, quindi specificare l'output solo per le pagine selezionate.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> can also be set programmatically, though the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=nameWithType> implementation is the same.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> possono essere impostate anche a livello di codice, tuttavia il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=nameWithType> implementazione è lo stesso.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange" /> property is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Il valore della proprietà <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange" /> non è uno dei valori di <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the printing output is sent to a file instead of a port.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se l'output di stampa viene inviato in un file piuttosto che a una porta.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the printing output is sent to a file; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se l'output di stampa viene inviato in un file; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintToFile%2A> property is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> when the user selects the **Print to file** option.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintToFile%2A> proprietà viene utilizzata per la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> quando l'utente seleziona il **stampa su file** opzione.

trans-unit.source: In such a case, the output port is set to "FILE," causing the Windows printing subsystem to prompt the user for a file name when the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method is called.
trans-unit.target: In tal caso, la porta di output è impostata su "FILE","sottosistema Windows stampa richiedere all'utente per un file quando il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> metodo viene chiamato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintToFile%2A> property is only used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> and cannot be set programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintToFile%2A> proprietà viene utilizzata solo per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> e non può essere impostato a livello di codice.

trans-unit.source: The `Print to file` option only appears on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowPrintToFile%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Il `Print to file` opzione viene visualizzata solo nel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowPrintToFile%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> è impostata su `true`.

trans-unit.source: The handle to a Win32 <see langword="DEVMODE" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Handle per una struttura <see langword="DEVMODE" /> Win32.

trans-unit.source: Copies the relevant information out of the given handle and into the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings" />.
trans-unit.target: Copia le informazioni rilevanti dall'handle specificato all'interno di <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings" />.

trans-unit.source: `DEVMODE` structures are device specific and copying a `DEVMODE` structure from one <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> to a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> for a different printer is not supported.
trans-unit.target: `DEVMODE` le strutture sono specifici del dispositivo e copia un `DEVMODE` struttura da una <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> per un <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> per una stampante diversa non è supportata.

trans-unit.source: The printer handle is not valid.
trans-unit.target: L'handle della stampante non è valido.

trans-unit.source: for printing and access to all printers on the network.
trans-unit.target: Per stampare e accedere a tutte le stampanti in rete.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.AllPrinting" />
trans-unit.target: Enumerazione associata: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.AllPrinting" />

trans-unit.source: The handle to a Win32 <see langword="DEVNAMES" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Handle per una struttura <see langword="DEVNAMES" /> Win32.

trans-unit.source: Copies the relevant information out of the given handle and into the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings" />.
trans-unit.target: Copia le informazioni rilevanti dall'handle specificato all'interno di <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings" />.

trans-unit.source: The printer handle is invalid.
trans-unit.target: L’handle della stampante non è valido.

trans-unit.source: for printing and access to all printers on the network.
trans-unit.target: Per stampare e accedere a tutte le stampanti in rete.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.AllPrinting" />
trans-unit.target: Enumerazione associata: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.AllPrinting" />

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this printer supports color printing.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se questa stampante supporta la stampa a colori.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this printer supports color; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se questa stampante supporta la stampa a colori; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: To print using color, and if the printer supports it, set <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Color%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Per stampare a colori e, se la stampante supporta questa modalità, impostare <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Color%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> a `true`.

trans-unit.source: The following code example prints a document with the first page in color, if the printer supports it.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente stampa un documento con la prima pagina di colore, se la stampante supporta questa.

trans-unit.source: The example requires that a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> variable named `printDoc` has been created, and the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings> events are handled.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio si presuppone che un <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> variabile denominata `printDoc` è stato creato e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings> vengono gestiti gli eventi.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespaces for this example.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Drawing> e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> gli spazi dei nomi per questo esempio.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of the last page to print.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il numero dell'ultima pagina da stampare.

trans-unit.source: The number of the last page to print.
trans-unit.target: Il numero dell'ultima pagina da stampare.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> properties are used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> when the user selects a print range.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> vengono utilizzate da di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> quando l'utente seleziona un intervallo di stampa.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSomePages%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property must be set to `true` to enable the user to specify a print range.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.AllowSomePages%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> proprietà deve essere impostata su `true` per consentire all'utente di specificare un intervallo di stampa.

trans-unit.source: In addition, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> also requires the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MinimumPage%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MaximumPage%2A> to be specified and the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> value to be within that range.
trans-unit.target: Inoltre, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> richiede anche il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MinimumPage%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.MaximumPage%2A> specificare e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> valore sia all'interno dell'intervallo.

trans-unit.source: During the printing process, in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=nameWithType> event, view the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> to determine what should be printed.
trans-unit.target: Durante il processo di stampa nel <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento, visualizzazione di <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> per determinare cosa deve essere stampata.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> is <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange.SomePages?displayProperty=nameWithType>, use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> properties to determine what pages should be printed.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> è <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange.SomePages?displayProperty=nameWithType>, utilizzare il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> proprietà per individuare le pagine da stampare.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> is <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange.Selection?displayProperty=nameWithType>, then specify output only for the selected pages.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> è <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange.Selection?displayProperty=nameWithType>, quindi specificare l'output solo per le pagine selezionate.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> can also be set programmatically, though the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=nameWithType> implementation is the same.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.FromPage%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> possono essere impostate anche a livello di codice, tuttavia il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=nameWithType> implementazione è lo stesso.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage" /> property is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: Il valore della proprietà <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.ToPage" /> è minore di 0.

trans-unit.source: Provides information about the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings" /> in string form.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce informazioni sulla classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings" />, sotto forma di stringa.

trans-unit.source: A string.
trans-unit.target: Una stringa.
